title: Why was I banned for this?
body:
I literally wasn't being toxic at all. I actually got two honors this game too (not from premade). wtf riot?

Game 1
In-Game
x: hi
x: i called bot in champ select ahaha
x: it's ok
x: %%%%%%
x: nice outplay
x: ggwp

I didn't even know you could get banned from one game...

replies.body:
> x: %%%%%%

Hate speech will always get you a 14-day ban from the gate. You should know better than to use it.

So.. based on the number of %, I'd say that's hate speech towards gay people?

Because that's a 0 tolerance phrase.  Instant 14 day ban.

I feel like the question is insincere, since you were here previously for pretty much the same thing;
